file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: compensation
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [WorkDay Compensation REST API v1](https://community.workday.com/sites/default/files/file-hosting/restapi/index.html) OpenAPI specification.

    The Workday compensation service enables applications to extend Workday's HCM compensation features.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
 
    Follow [this guide] https://credentials.workday.com/docs/authentication/ and obtain tokens.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Workday Compensation
    iconPath: icon.png
  version: v2
tags:
  - name: scorecardResults
    description: Provides the ability to set up and retrieve Scores on Scorecard Results.
  - name: scorecards
    description: Provides the ability to set up and retrieve Scores on Scorecard Results.
  - name: workers
paths:
  /scorecardResults:
    get:
      tags:
        - scorecardResults
      summary: Provides the ability to set up and retrieve Scores on Scorecard Results.
      operationId: getScorecardResults
      description: |-
        Retrieves the Scorecard Results.

        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus

        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/ScoresetContainer
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
        - scorecardResults
      summary: Creates a new Scorecard Result.
      operationId: createsNewScorecardResults
      description: >-
        In the request body, specify these required fields:


        * compensationScorecard  - The Workday ID of a Compensation Scorecard.
        You can use a returned id from the GET /scorecards method.

        * evaluationDate - The date when the Scorecard Result is evaluated. Use
        the yyyy-mm-dd format.


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateScorecardResults
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateScorecardResults
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            Either specify a different Evaluation Date or edit the existing
            Scores. The Scorecard Result for the specified Scorecard and
            Evaluation Date already exists:([scores])


            Change the Evaluation Date to a date that is on or after the
            Effective Date of the selected Scorecard. The specified Evaluation
            Date is before the earliest Effective Date of the selected
            Scorecard.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createScorecardResults
  /scorecards:
    get:
      tags:
        - scorecards
      summary: Retrieves Compensation Scorecard information.
      operationId: getCompensationScorecards
      description: >-
        Retrieves Compensation Scorecard information including the
        scorecardName, scorecardDescription, inactive status,
        defaultScorecardGoals, scorecardProfiles containing
        profileScorecardGoals as of the effective date. The default effective
        date is the request date.


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: effectiveDate
          in: query
          description: Effective date the scorecard task takes effect.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/ScoreCard
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
        - scorecards
      summary: Creates a Compensation Scorecard
      operationId: createsCompensationScorecards
      description: >-
        Creates a new Compensation Scorecard.


        In the request body, specify these required fields: scorecardName,
        effectiveDate, and defaultScorecardGoals[ {goalName, goalWeight} ]. 

        If you specify the optional scorecardProfiles[], you must specify the
        eligibilityRule{id} and at least 1 goal in profileScorecardGoals[
        {goalName, goalWeight} ].


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: effectiveDate
          in: query
          description: Effective date the scorecard task takes effect.
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/CreateScoreCard
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateScoreCard
        '400':
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            A Default Scorecard ~Goal~ is missing

            ~Goal~ Weights must be greater than 0.

            There are duplicate eligibility rules on this request.

            Scorecard Name entered has already been used.

            A ~Goal~ is missing for a Scorecard Profile.

            The sum of the ~goal~ weightings must equal 100%.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: createScorecard
  /workers/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - workers
      summary: Retrieves a worker instance.
      operationId: getWorkerInstance
      description: >-
        Secured by: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports, Self-Service: Current
        Staffing Information


        Scope: Staffing
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/WorkerProfile
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /scorecardResults/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - scorecardResults
      summary: Provides the ability to set up and retrieve Scores on Scorecard Results.
      operationId: getAndSetUpScoresOnScorecardResults
      description: |-
        Retrieves the Scorecard Results.

        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus

        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScoresetContainer
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    delete:
      tags:
        - scorecardResults
      summary: Deletes the Scorecard Results with the specified ID.
      operationId: deleteScorecardResultsByID
      description: |-
        Deletes the Scorecard Results with the specified ID.

        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus

        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Deleting resource.
          content: {}
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            You can’t delete the Scorecard Results used in a completed or
            in-progress compensation review process.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /workers:
    get:
      tags:
        - workers
      summary: Retrieves a collection of workers.
      operationId: getWorkerCollection
      description: >-
        Secured by: Worker Data: Public Worker Reports, Self-Service: Current
        Staffing Information


        Scope: Staffing
      parameters:
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: >-
            The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is
            20. The maximum is 100.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: >-
            The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
            The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control
            paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset
            is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with
            the 10th object.
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: search
          in: query
          description: >-
            Searches ~workers~ by name. The search is case-insensitive. You can
            include space-delimited search strings for an OR search.
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: >-
                        #/components/schemas/WorkerSummary
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /workers/{id}/requestOneTimePayment:
    post:
      tags:
        - workers
      summary: Request a one-time payment for a worker with the specified ID.
      operationId: requestOneTimePayment
      description: >-
        Creates a one-time payment for a worker with the specified ID, and
        initiates the Request One-Time Payment business process. In the request
        body, specify at least these required fields: reason{id}, position{id},
        oneTimePayments[ paymentCurrency{id}, oneTimePaymentPlan {id}].


        Sample format for paymentAmount:

        "payment Amount": {
                 "value": "2500"
        }


        Secured by: Request One-Time Payment (REST Service)


        Scope: Core Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/OneTimePaymentPlanEventInput
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/OneTimePaymentPlanEventInput
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            At least 1 One-Time Payment is required.


            Based on the worktag type configuration following worktag types are
            not valid for taggable type [tt]: [awt]. Please remove all worktags
            for the invalid worktag types.


            If specifying a Coverage Date range, then both dates must be
            specified.


            The coverage period End Date must be on or after Start Date.


            The job is not valid for the ~employee~.


            Multiple One-Time Payment is not enabled. Please enable Multiple
            One-Time Payment in HCM Tenant Setup - Compensation.


            Scheduled Payment Date must be equal to Event Effective Date when
            Multiple One-Time Payment is not enabled in Edit Tenant Setup - HCM.


            Compensation Change cannot take place before ~Employee~ Hire Date.


            The ~employee~ you have selected has more than one job. You must
            supply the job to which this operation applies.


            The ~Employee~ Visibility Date has been set to a value, but the
            ~Employee~ Visibility Feature has not been activated in the HCM
            Tenant settings. Please leave the date blank or activate the feature
            in the tenant level settings.


            Position submitted is not filled as of the effective date.


            Either an amount or a percent for the One-Time Payment is required.


            Coverage Start Date and Coverage End Date can not be entered for a
            One-Time Payment Plan that does not have Coverage Dates enabled.


            Select a balancing worktag for Worktags of the following type:
            [type]


            A One-Time Payment plan is required.


            Scheduled Payment Date cannot take place before the One Time Payment
            Effective Date.


            The following Accounting Worktags are required but have not been
            assigned: [missing].


            Please use a valid One-Time Payment plan.


            The ~Employee~ Visibility Date must be on or after the Effective
            Date.


            Effective Date is required.


            Only one worktag for each type is allowed for each document line.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: oneTimePaymentPlanEventInput
  /scorecardResults/{id}/scores/{subresourceID}:
    patch:
      tags:
        - scorecardResults
      summary: Updates the Score for the specified Scorecard Result.
      operationId: updateScore
      description: >-
        Sets the achievement value for the specified Score in the specified
        Scorecard Result.

        Specify the required achievement value as a percentage (1-100%).


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: subresourceID
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the subresource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScoreInput'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating resource.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScoreInput
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            You can’t update Scorecard Results used in a completed compensation
            review process.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: scoreInput
  /scorecards/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - scorecards
      summary: Retrieves Compensation Scorecard information.
      operationId: getCompensationScoreCardInfo
      description: >-
        Retrieves Compensation Scorecard information including the
        scorecardName, scorecardDescription, inactive status,
        defaultScorecardGoals, scorecardProfiles containing
        profileScorecardGoals as of the effective date. The default effective
        date is the request date.


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScoreCard
        '400':
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    put:
      tags:
        - scorecards
      summary: Updates a Compensation Scorecard
      operationId: UpdateCompensationScorecard
      description: >-
        Replaces an existing Compensation Scorecard as of the specified
        effectiveDate. 

        Call GET /scorecards/{id} to initially populate the request body with
        the existing data. You can then update the scorecardName,
        scorecardDescription, and inactive fields. You can also add, update, and
        delete the existing data in defaultScorecardGoals[],
        scorecardProfiles[], and profileScorecardGoals[].


        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus


        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/EditScoreCards
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating resource.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/EditScoreCards
        '400':
          description: >-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)


            A Default Scorecard ~Goal~ is missing


            A Scorecard Profile doesn't exist as of the Effective Date. Remove
            or replace the invalid Scorecard Profile or change the Effective
            Date.


            A Scorecard Profile is already in use on another Scorecard. Select a
            Scorecard Profile that's not already in use.


            You entered duplicate ~Goals~. Replace or remove the duplicates.


            You can't edit the compensation scorecard [scorecard] for the
            Effective Date [date] because the latest dated performance results
            associated with the scorecard is the date [latest date]. Enter an
            Effective Date for editing the scorecard that is after the following
            date: [latest date]


            There are duplicate eligibility rules on this request.


            Enter an Effective Date that is on or after the first Effective Date
            of the scorecard: [effectiveDate].


            You entered duplicate Scorecard Profiles. Replace or remove the
            duplicates.


            Scorecard Name entered has already been used.


            A ~Goal~ is missing for a Scorecard Profile.


            A ~Goal~ is invalid. Enter a valid ~Goal~.


            ~Goal~ Weights must be greater than 0.


            A ~Goal~ doesn't exist as of the Effective Date. Remove or replace
            the invalid ~Goal~ or change the Effective Date.


            The sum of the ~goal~ weightings must equal 100%.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: editScorecards
    delete:
      tags:
        - scorecards
      summary: Deletes a Compensation Scorecard with the specified ID.
      operationId: deleteCompensationScorecardByID
      description: |-
        Deletes Compensation Scorecards.

        Secured by: Set Up: Merit and Bonus

        Scope: Advanced Compensation
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: The Workday ID of the resource.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: >-
            Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Deleting resource.
          content: {}
        '400':
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            The Compensation Scorecard cannot be deleted because it is in use.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '401':
          description: >-
            Invalid resource or operation.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '403':
          description: >-
            User has insufficient permissions.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        '404':
          description: >-
            Resource not found.
            (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
components:
  schemas:
    INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - id
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          pattern: ^(?:(?:[0-9a-f]{32})|(?:[0-9]+\$[0-9]+)|(\S+=\S+))$
          type: string
          description: wid / id / reference id
        descriptor:
          type: string
          description: A description of the instance
          readOnly: true
        href:
          type: string
          description: A link to the instance
          readOnly: true
    ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      required:
        - error
      type: object
      properties:
        error:
          type: string
          description: A description of the error
    VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        - type: object
          properties:
            errors:
              type: array
              description: An array of validation errors
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    FACETS_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          descriptor:
            type: string
            description: A description of the facet
          facetParameter:
            type: string
            description: The alias used to select the facet
          values:
            type: array
            description: the facet values
            items:
              required:
                - id
              type: object
              properties:
                count:
                  type: integer
                  description: The number of instances returned by this facet
                  format: int32
                id:
                  pattern: ^(?:(?:[0-9a-f]{32})|(?:[0-9]+\$[0-9]+)|(\S+=\S+))$
                  type: string
                  description: wid / id / reference id
                descriptor:
                  type: string
                  description: A description of the facet
                href:
                  type: string
                  description: A link to the instance
                  readOnly: true
        description: This object represents the possible facets for this resource
        readOnly: true
    MULTIPLE_INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE:
      type: object
      properties:
        total:
          type: integer
        data:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/INSTANCE_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    CreateScoreCard:
      allOf:
        - required:
            - defaultScorecardGoals
            - effectiveDate
            - scorecardName
          type: object
          properties:
            effectiveDate:
              type: string
              description: >-
                The Effective Date of the Compensation Scorecard in format
                YYYY-MM-DD
              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            scorecardName:
              type: string
              description: The name of the Compensation Scorecard.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            defaultScorecardGoals:
              type: array
              description: The ~goals~ for the Compensation Scorecard.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateGoals
              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            scorecardProfiles:
              type: array
              description: The profiles for the Compensation Scorecard.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/CreateScorecardProfiles
              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            inactive:
              type: boolean
              description: >-
                Indicates whether the Scorecard is inactive using a value of
                true/false.
              example: true
              x-workday-type: Boolean
            scorecardDescription:
              type: string
              description: The description of the Compensation Scorecard.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance
    EditScoreCards:
      allOf:
        - required:
            - defaultScorecardGoals
            - effectiveDate
            - scorecardName
          type: object
          properties:
            inactive:
              type: boolean
              description: >-
                Replaces the inactive status of the Compensation Scorecard as of
                the specified effectiveDate.  Default value: false.
              example: true
              x-workday-type: Boolean
            effectiveDate:
              type: string
              description: >-
                The Effective Date of the updates to the Compensation
                Scorecard.  Date must be entered in format: YYYY-MM-DD.
              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            scorecardDescription:
              type: string
              description: >-
                Replaces the description of the Compensation Scorecard as of the
                specified effectiveDate.  Deletes the description if a
                description exists as of the specified effectiveDate and this
                field is not included in the PUT.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            scorecardProfiles:
              type: array
              description: >-
                Replaces the array of Profile Scorecard Goals and Eligibility
                Rules as of the specified effectiveDate.  Creates a new array if
                one does not exist.  Deletes the array if one exists as of the
                specified effectiveDate and the array is not included in the
                PUT.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScorecardProfiles
              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            defaultScorecardGoals:
              type: array
              description: >-
                Replaces the array of Default Scorecard Goal fields as of the
                specified effectiveDate.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScoreCardGoals
              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            scorecardName:
              type: string
              description: >-
                Replaces the name of the Compensation Scorecard as of the
                specified effectiveDate.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,
                ubique iisque contentiones ex duo. Quo lorem etiam eu.
              x-workday-type: Text
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance
    ScoreCard:
      allOf:
        - type: object
          properties:
            inactive:
              type: boolean
              description: >-
                Indicates whether the Scorecard is inactive using a value of
                true/false.
              example: true
              x-workday-type: Boolean
            defaultScorecardGoals:
              type: array
              description: The goals for the Compensation Scorecard.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScorecardGoalSummary

            scorecardDescription:

              x-workday-type: Text
            scorecardProfiles:
              type: array
              description: The profiles for the Compensation Scorecard.
              items:
                $ref: >-
                  #/components/schemas/ScoreCardProfile
              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            scorecardName:
              type: string
              description: The name of the Compensation Scorecard.
              example: >-
                Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, cum choro singulis consectetuer ut,

            effectiveDate:
              type: string
              description: >-

              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            id:
              type: string
              description: Id of the instance

              x-workday-type: Multi-instance
            paymentCurrency:
              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/PaymentCurrency

                (FLSA) reporting requirements.

              x-workday-type: Date

              type: object

            coverageEndDate:
              type: string

                The end date of the Coverage Period for the payment, which

                possible to override the calculation basis to calculate as a
                percentage of a set of compensation elements.

              x-workday-type: Numeric

              $ref: >-
                #/components/schemas/OneTimePaymentPlan

              format: date
              x-workday-type: Date
            sendToPayroll:
              type: boolean

                This is true if you selected Send to Payroll on the ~bonus~

                Payroll doesn't process the payment.

              x-workday-type: Boolean

              description: A preview of the instance
              example: Lorem ipsum dolor sit ame

              description: Id of the instance
